title: Reasons John 14:6 Is About More Than Belief  | Unapologetic Episode 17
itunes:title: Reasons John 14:6 Is About More Than Belief  | Unapologetic Episode 17
description:
Jesus makes a narrow claim in John 14:6, but is it a problem for those who reject Him? Welcome to Unapologetic, where we defend truth without comprise with Dr. Bobby Conway, the One Minute Apologist. 

Responsing to this article in Huffington Post   https://www.huffpost.com/entry/jesus-said-i-am-the-way-b_b_1318405#:~:text=Jesus%20said%20%E2%80%9CI%20am%20the,(John%2014%3A6).&text=That%20is%20to%20say%2C%20if,you%20could%20not%20know%20God.

Apologetics Crash Course- oneminuteapologist.com/acc

T-Shirts and Sweatshirts- https://teespring.com/stores/one-minute-apologist

Become A Patron-www.patreon.com/oneminuteapologist
